messages.title: YOUR FULL BREXIT
messages.content: Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.

messages.title: TACTICAL VOTING
messages.content: There are around 130 seats that the Conservatives haven't won in at least 50 years. Only the Brexit Party can beat Corbyn's Labour. Leavers, don't waste your vote.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting the cost of living, making the UK the best place to do business and planning to turbocharge the economy.
Increasing funding for police, the NHS, coastal border security, and schools.
Planting millions of trees to capture CO2, and recycling waste in the UK to make it a greener, cleaner place.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Strategic voting considerations are discussed, including in seats that Conservatives haven't won in 50 years and the strategy for Leavers to not waste their vote by voting for the Brexit Party.

issues.brexitEurope: Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.
issues.economy: Turbocharge the economy by cutting the cost of living and making the UK the best place to do business.
issues.environment: Planting millions of trees to capture CO2 and recycling waste in the UK.

housing.content: No explicit mention of housing policy.

quotes.text: Without the Brexit Party there can be no real Brexit.
quotes.date: During the campaign for the December 12th election

images.caption: Julian Carter standing confidently in front of a British flag.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet promotes strategic voting for The Brexit Party to accomplish Brexit, highlighting the inability of the Conservative Party to win certain seats and challenging Corbyn's Labour Party.
